title: How to sell healthcare system = Vikas makes India to america ?
selftext:
Answer has been found by supreme leader and his cutlery set.

https://m.thewire.in/article/education/neet-pg-cut-off-zero-percentile-health-ministry/amp

As a doctor I need to score 600/800 to get a seat for specialisation

But if you have 2-3 crores then you can actually score negative marks and become a surgeon or a gynecologist or dermatologist or radiologist.
Latest rate charts can be found in your newspapers.

Welcome to Bharat dear friends.

Vikas pe baat, Gobi aur chota fanta ke sath.
comments: the medical education is an organised "mafia" kinda sitiation bro...

If people limit wasting their energy bitching about nepotism in the Bollywood, they may realize how fucked up the system is around us and how the rich have all sorts of privileges not exclusive to Bollywood.
